ðŸ“– Summary: PicoShare is a minimalist, self-hostable file-sharing service written in Go. It provides direct download links for any file type and size without re-encoding or resizing, ensuring users receive their files exactly as uploaded. It supports local storage and cloud data replication via Litestream for persistence.
